map.tile.starter.name: Starter Tile
map.tile.starter.description: Starting tile automatically placed when the hero first arrives on the Map.
map.tile.regular.name: Regular Tile
map.tile.regular.description: When <style="status">Exploring</style>, these tiles can be placed anywhere.
map.tile.core.name: Core Tile
map.tile.core.description: When <style="status">Exploring</style>, these tiles can only be placed <style="status">adjacent</style> to <style="value">2</style> other tiles.
map.show.btn.label: Show Map
map.hide.btn.label: Hide Map
